}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The regulatory model cited by the FCC documents is RSVLD-0506]. However, the device is more commonly identified by its HP P/N of '''{{HP PN|1150-7910}}'''.
This board is using the [[Broadcom BCM94320LPH]] reference design. The BCM4320 used is a BCM4320LKFBG. OEM: [[Foxconn U98H029]] ([[Foxconn]])
There appear to be multiple USB connectors on the board for the device.. one of which is a Mini B connector (which may be omitted on some [but not all] production models).
There is a MAC label with an 00:10:18 (''[[Broadcom]]'') OUI in the FCC photos.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
